comments.body:
Maybe also add a test with microseconds, so that we see that there's no rounding error somewhere inbetween :) (now there isn't, but a later change might introduce something like this)

Maybe it would also make sense to test all supported units.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +471,475 @@    assert nanoseconds == 5000000000
    nanoseconds = convert_duration_to_nanosecond('1m5s')
    assert nanoseconds == 65000000000
    with pytest.raises(ValueError):
        convert_duration_to_nanosecond([1, 2, 3])
